original_title: Pakisabi Na Lang... Mahal Ko Siya
overview: The story revolves a Gonzo falling for his substitute teacher Geraldine with the p.e. teacher. Through Geraldine's guidance and tutorship, Gonzo mended his happy-go-lucky ways, dreaming romantic scenarios with his teacher in between.
tagline: Kung may feeling ka... Huwag nang pasimple (If you have feelings ... Show it)
title: Pakisabi Na Lang... Mahal Ko Siya
